availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Catharine Jane Martin Viley (Married Warren Viley)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Warren Viley. Mother of George W. Viley, John W. Viley, Ann E. Viley, Martha J. Viley, Breckinridge Viley, and May Viley.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, District No. 1, p. 442B. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles Township, p. 58. "Maj. Viley. Famous Kentucky Turfman Dies at Midway", Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), January 20, 1902, p. 2. Find A Grave, "Catharine Jane Martin Viley (1821-1886)," Memorial #98984089, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/98984089/catharine-jane-viley (accessed January 16, 2018).
